description: '''Alejandro Brittes''' (born July 5, 1976) is an Argentine composer, accordionist and researcher of the music of the  littoral region of Argentina. He has been residing in [[Porto Alegre]], Brazil since 2010. He has more than 30 years of performing [[chamamé]] around the world. He researches the musical origins of the Chamamé rhythm, and the identity of that musical genre. He has toured with artists such as: [[Chango Spasiuk]], Raúl Barboza, Os Fagundes, Elton Saldanha and done performances with Brazilian artists such as [[Luiza Possi]].
